humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastases in 1 sentinel lymph node (Rule 10 and New Rule 12 apply), making the N stage N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in 1 sentinel node (diagnosis A) following carcinoma of the right breast. This indicates that the cancer has spread to at least one axillary lymph node. The N stage for cancer that has spread to 1-3 axillary lymph nodes is N1, ignoring any substaging information.
